ESRI.Configuration.Name: Centerline Flipper
ESRI.Configuration.Description: Add-in to flip the direction of a centerline and then change the address range attributes
ESRI.Configuration.Author: Elliott Plack
ESRI.Configuration.Company: Baltimore County Office of Information Technology

Button.caption: Flip Centerlines
Button.message: Flips the centerline direction and swaps the left/right from/to attributes
